Description: The following statement contains a magic number: listView = new ListView  			{  				Margin = new Thickness(20)'  				ItemTemplate = new DataTemplate(() =>  				{  					var label = new Label  					{  						VerticalTextAlignment = TextAlignment.Center'  						HorizontalOptions = LayoutOptions.StartAndExpand  					};  					label.SetBinding(Label.TextProperty' "Name");    					var tick = new Image  					{  						Source = ImageSource.FromFile("check.png")'  						HorizontalOptions = LayoutOptions.End  					};  					tick.SetBinding(VisualElement.IsVisibleProperty' "Done");    					var stackLayout = new StackLayout  					{  						Margin = new Thickness(20' 0' 0' 0)'  						Orientation = StackOrientation.Horizontal'  						HorizontalOptions = LayoutOptions.FillAndExpand'  						Children = { label' tick }  					};    					return new ViewCell { View = stackLayout };  				})  			};
